item.description:
August 26-LUAU PARTY PIG ROAST...Celebrate summer!! It’s an authentic
Island BBQ Pig Roast Buffet from 12-4:00pm. Join us for a fun filled afternoon with music provided by “Christopher John”. There will be drink specials plus a $10.99 authentic island Pig Roast Buffet.
In addition to the pig there will be a full BBQ buffet loaded with BBQ Chicken, pulled pork, and other island delights.Lets get a group of friends together to celebrate summer at the Lake House!

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Angelico's Lake House Luau and Pig Roast...
